conversation.text: good morning what brings you in today good morning doctor I've been having a sore throat and a slight fever for the past two days have you had any cough diff
a contact with somebody who have sick now I've been at home mostly but the weather has been changing a lot with you that could be a factor let me check your temperature and
is it something serious nothing to worry about I prescribed you some antibiotics make sure to rest drink plenty of fluids and avoid cold foods thank you

follow_up_questions: Have you taken any fever-reducing medication?
Are you taking any other medications?
Have you experienced any side effects from your medications?
